H0.text: Who led a revolt against the Normans in 1070 from stronghold on the Isle of Ely? ,. Edgar the Atheling

H1.text: Who led a revolt against the Normans in 1070 from stronghold on the Isle of Ely? ,. Waltheof

H2.text: Who led a revolt against the Normans in 1070 from stronghold on the Isle of Ely? ,. Morcar

H3.text: Who led a revolt against the Normans in 1070 from stronghold on the Isle of Ely? ,. Hereward

A4.text: His base when he led the rebellion against the Norman rulers was the Isle of Ely

A5.text: In 1070 Hereward certainly participated in the anti-Norman insurrection centred on the Isle of Ely
